ing: 1 (1 ounce) packet Hidden ValleyÂ® Original RanchÂ® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
des: "Twice-baked potatoes get a flavor infusion from Hidden ValleyÂ® Original Ranch SaladÂ® Dressing & Seasoning mix."
ins: Scoop the potato out of the skins; combine with sour cream and dressing mix. Fill skins with mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 375 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until cheese is melted. Garnish with green onions and/or bacon bits, if desired.
